717993f-b.text:
(1)
Canal Street, north side, east from Chrystie Street. This view shows in the foreground a part of the vehicular approach to the Manhattan Bridge. This building is being demolished.
July 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same view, but from a slightly different angde. This
photo does not show the ground floor of the building.
July 27, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A view northward through a partially demolished wall of the Marcue Building. Note Libby's Hotel (Delancey Street) in the distance.
October 11, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.  E 5 Negafie a E932
717993f-b.folder: Canal Street & Chrystie Street, Manhattan, NY

717994f-a.text:

717994f-a.folder: Canal Street & Chrystie Street, Manhattan, NY

723049f-a.text:
Roosevelt (Sarah Delano) Park: Two views of the southern and of the cleared area that will form this East Side park. Chrystie Street bounds same on the right and Forsyth Street on the left. These photographs are in a southward direction to Canal Street and show the columnaded entrance to the Manhattan Bridge at that point. View 1 is from Broome Street,
while No. 2 is from Hester Street.
October 7, 1930.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
723049f-a.folder: Canal Street & Chrystie Street, Manhattan, NY

723049f-b.text:
Roosevelt (Sarah Delano) Park: Two views of the southern and of the cleared area that will form this East Side park. Chrystie Street bounds same on the right and Forsyth Street on the left. These photographs are in a southward direction to Canal Street and show the columnaded entrance to the Manhattan Bridge at that point. View 1 is from Broome Street,
while No. 2 is from Hester Street.
October 7, 1930.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
723049f-b.folder: Canal Street & Chrystie Street, Manhattan, NY

718806f-a.text:
A general view northward along Chrystie (left) and Forsyth (right) Streets, from the Manhattan Bridge, at Canal Street, and showing clearance for the Sarah Delano Roosevelt Park. Intersecting streets, shown in the ord)r of their appearance, are Hester, Grand, Broome, Delancey, Rivington, Stanton
and East Houston.
January 14, 1932.
International News Photo.
718806f-a.folder: Canal Street & Chrystie Street, Manhattan, NY

718808f-a.text:
Chrystie Street, vest side, north from but not including Canal Street, taken from Forsyth Street. The clearance in the foreground is
the site for Roosevelt Park.
March 14, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
718808f-a.folder: Chrystie Street & Canal Street, Manhattan, NY
